response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value and significance for us. Given its importance, we believe it's worth more than what others might perceive. Considering its true worth to you, we propose to sell it to you for $14,000. This price reflects its exceptional quality and the opportunity it presents to you. We trust this offer will meet your expectations and allows you to secure this valuable asset at a fair yet advantageous rate. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let us know promptly. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 14000}
